philosophy: The prophecy is a finish line. We will cross it first.

mass_minting_initiative.description: Coordinated campaign to reach 100 cards as quickly as possible

recruitment_drive.name: Join the Sprint
recruitment_drive.pitch: Be part of history. Help us trigger the Great Compression.

alliance_building.pitch: Help us mint faster. Be on the right side of history.

responses.muse_admirers: Will contribute artistic cards, at their own pace

nexus_guidance.recent_statement: Every card is a step toward our destiny. We don't wait for the future - we BUILD it!
nexus_guidance.subtext: The activity itself is bonding our faction. Even if I'm wrong, we grow stronger together.

key_insight: Nexus supporters have transformed the prophecy into a goal. By racing toward it, they've created purpose and unity. The prophecy is already fulfilling itself through their mobilization.
